main event: A businessman named Mr. Joseph Cooper reported sighting a bright, metallic, disc-shaped object that hovered over a field near his home in Dixon, Illinois in December 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering for several minutes before moving rapidly away to the northeast.
Mr. Cooper called the local police to report the sighting, but the object had disappeared by the time the police arrived on the scene.
Later that evening, Mr. Cooper and several other local residents reported seeing the object again as it returned to the Dixon area, maneuvering at high speeds and making abrupt changes in direction.
The U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book concluded that Mr. Cooper's sighting was a genuine close encounter with an unidentified aerial phenomenon.
The report includes details about the object's size, shape, color, and movements, as well as the weather conditions and time of day during the sighting.
